issue.title: Update Multisense ladar and camera values to match hardware

content.raw:
As @scpeters mentioned in #386, these changes were made in ddd4a95 and 999b1e1.
I don't really understand your comment about 10Hz - you can set it to anywhere between 1 and 30Hz at any currently selectable resolution (which really is only 1024x544 w/ on-board stereo block-matching and 2048x1088 w/o on-board stereo).

The MultiSense-SL does have an IMU, it's just not accessible through the driver yet (see the long list of TODO features to be added to MS).
content.html:
As @scpeters mentioned in #386, these changes were made in ddd4a95 and 999b1e1. I don't really understand your comment about 10Hz - you can set it to anywhere between 1 and 30Hz at any currently selectable resolution (which really is only 1024x544 w/ on-board stereo block-matching and 2048x1088 w/o on-board stereo).

The MultiSense-SL does have an IMU, it's just not accessible through the driver yet (see the long list of TODO features to be added to MS).
